db:abstract.db:para: Changes to Qt Mac Extras, Qt Windows Extras, and Qt X11 Extras.

db:article.db:para: Qt 6 is a result of the conscious effort to make the framework more efficient and easy to use.
We try to maintain binary and source compatibility for all the public APIs in each release. But some changes were inevitable in an effort to make Qt a better framework.

One of those changes was to remove the platform-specific Extras modules, to ensure a cohesive cross-platform story and future for Qt 6. Most of the the functionality offered by these modules are replaced by a similar functionality in other Qt modules. This guide summarizes those alternatives, and provides guidance for the cases where Qt does not offer a replacement API.

db:section.db:title: QtMac namespace
db:section.db:para: Most members of the QtMac namespace have explicit replacements. The QtMac::fromCGImageRef function has been removed due to lack of known clients of the API.

db:section.db:title: QMacPasteboardMime
db:section.db:para: The QMacPasteboardMime class has been replaced with QUtiMimeConverter. See Changes to Qt GUI#Native clipboard integration for details.

db:section.db:title: QMacToolBar
db:section.db:para: The QMacToolBar and QMacToolBarItem classes have been removed. Use QToolBar as a replacement.

db:section.db:title: QtWin namespace
db:section.db:para: Many members of the QtWin namespace have explicit replacements. To use these replacements with Qt Widgets or Qt Quick, operate on the QWindow representation of the relevant widget or control.
The remaining functions have been removed:

db:section.db:title: errorStringFromHresult
db:section.db:para: Only used internally in WinExtras. No other known clients of the API.

db:section.db:title: colorizationColor/isCompositionOpaque
db:section.db:para: Concept exists on other platforms (tint/accent color). Warrants new cross-platform API, for example a new QPalette role or platform theme property.

db:section.db:title: setWindowFlip3DPolicy
db:section.db:para: Windows 7 feature. No longer supported in Windows 10.

db:section.db:title: extendFrameIntoClientArea
db:section.db:para: Similar functionality exists on other platforms. Warrants cross-platform QWindow API to control the relationship between the client area and the non-client area (frame/titlebar). See QTBUG-94010 for details.

db:section.db:title: enableBlurBehind
db:section.db:para: Deprecated as of Windows 8.

db:section.db:title: taskbarActivateTab and taskbar(Add/Delete)Tab
db:section.db:para: No known clients of the API.

db:section.db:title: QWinMime
db:section.db:para: The QWinMime class has been replaced with QWindowsMimeConverter. See Changes to Qt GUI#Native clipboard integration for details.

db:section.db:title: QWinJumpList
db:section.db:para: The QWinJumpList, QWinJumpListCategory, and QWinJumpListItem classes have been removed due to warranting a cross-platform solution. See QTBUG-94007 for details.

db:section.db:title: QWinTaskbarButton
db:section.db:para: The QWinTaskbarButton and QWinTaskbarProgress classes have been removed due to warranting a cross-platform solution. See QTBUG-94009 and QTBUG-94008 for details.

db:section.db:title: QWinThumbnailToolBar
db:section.db:para: The QWinThumbnailToolBar and QWinThumbnailToolButton classes have been removed due to lack of known clients of the API.

db:section.db:title: Changes to Qt X11 Extras
db:section.db:para: The Qt X11 Extras module was removed in Qt 6.

db:section.db:title: Changes to Qt Android Extras
db:section.db:para: Key functionality from the module has been brought over to other Qt modules.

Clients that still rely on missing functionality can include the private header <QtCore/private/qandroidextras_p.h> as a stopgap solution. To enable private headers use QT += core-private with qmake, or add a project dependency to Qt::CorePrivate with CMake.

db:section.db:title: QAndroidJniObject and QAndroidJniEnvironment
db:section.db:para: The QAndroidJniObject and QAndroidJniEnvironment classes have been replaced by QJniObject and QJniEnvironment respectively.
The QAndroidJniExceptionCleaner class is no longer needed. See QJniEnvironment::checkAndClearExceptions() for a replacement.

db:section.db:title: QtAndroid namespace
db:section.db:para: Many members of the QtAndroid namespace have replacements in the QAndroidApplication native interface.

db:section.db:title: Permissions
db:section.db:para: The Application Permissions infrastructure allows requesting a set of permissions in a cross-platform manner.
The QtAndroidPrivate namespace can be used to access Android-specific permissions not covered by the cross-platform permissions system.
